description.narrative: The CHANGE goal is to empower youth, youth civil society organizations and institutions for sustainable development of a youth framework in BiH and recognition of youth as the driving force behind positive change in BiH on its EU path. If youth civil society organizations (YCSOs) get support and build their capacities to establish sufficient linkages among each other; get support in diversifying funding sources; and improve their cooperation with authorities; if authorities in BiH build their capacities for taking a comprehensive approach to youth issues and if youth gain skills, attitude and knowledge on youth policy framework, then YCSOs will become more sustainable, effective, integrated, responsive, and accountable entities within their respective communities and BiH society; youth participation will increase and young people will be seen as a resource on Bosnia and Herzegovinas EU path. The CHANGE - Youth Leadership Programme toward transformative society takes a comprehensive approach that makes meaningful linkages throughout the following components and its activities: Component 1 Empowerment of youth leadership through capacity building Within this component, KULT and strategic partners will empower youth (both women and men and especially marginalized youth) to take a leadership role, coordinate, lead and cooperate with YCSOs and authorities in their communities. This will be done through educational training programmes, sub-grants to YCSOs and grants for local civic initiatives across BiH. Component 2 Empowering youth development through granting The programme will award and manage grants to local partners to develop advocacy initiatives for the development of youth framework in BiH. The programme support will include grants and capacity building for YCSOs included in the programme. KULT will endeavour to establish connections and collaboration of YCSOs with relevant decision makers and other youth civil society stakeholders. KULT will introduce a platform for sharing experiences and developing the youth work community of practice in BiH through training of youth officers and youth workers, dialogue among organizations and through the Annual Youth Conference. Component 3 Advocacy and lobbying The programme will support and award grants to YCSO initiatives advocating for the implementation of a youth legal framework in BiH and supporting the development of the youth sector. At the same time, KULT will implement long-term advocacy initiatives for and with all levels of governance in BiH.

FÖRÄNDRINGSMålet är att stärka ungdomar, ungdomsorganisationer och institutioner för hållbar utveckling av ungdomsramar i Bosnien och Hercegovina och erkännande av ungdomar som drivkraften bakom en positiv förändring i Bosnien och Hercegovina på EU: s väg. Om ungdomsorganisationer i det civila samhället (YCSO) får stöd och bygger sin kapacitet till etablera tillräckliga kopplingar mellan varandra; få stöd för att diversifiera finansieringen källor; och förbättra deras samarbete med myndigheter; om myndigheterna i Bosnien och Hercegovina bygger upp sin förmåga att ta ett helhetsgrepp i ungdomsfrågor och om ungdomar får kompetens, attityd och kunskap om ungdomspolitiska ramar, då kommer YCSO: er att bli fler hållbara, effektiva, integrerade, lyhörda och ansvariga enheter inom sina respektive samhällen och Bosnien och Hercegovina samhället; ungdomsdeltagande kommer att öka och unga människor kommer att ses som en resurs på Bosnien och Hercegovinas EU -väg. Programmet har tre huvudkomponenter: -Komponent 1 -Bemyndigande av ungdomsledarskap genom kapacitetsuppbyggnad Inom denna komponent kommer KULT och strategiska partners att stärka ungdomar (båda kvinnorna och män och särskilt marginaliserade ungdomar) att ta en ledarroll, samordna, leda och samarbeta med YCSO och myndigheter i deras samhällen. Detta kommer att göras genom utbildningsprogram, sub-bidrag till YCSO och bidrag för lokala medborgarinitiativ i hela Bosnien och Hercegovina. -Komponent 2 -Stärka ungdomsutveckling genom bidrag Programmet kommer att tilldela och hantera bidrag till lokala partners för att utveckla påverkansarbete initiativ för utveckling av ungdomsramar i Bosnien och Hercegovina. Programstödet kommer inkludera bidrag och kapacitetsuppbyggnad för YCSO som ingår i programmet. KULT kommer sträva efter att upprätta förbindelser och samarbete mellan YCSO: er med relevanta beslut beslutsfattare och andra intressenter i det civila samhället för ungdomar. KULT kommer att introducera en plattform för dela erfarenheter och utveckla ungdomsarbetsgemenskapen i Bosnien och Hercegovina genom utbildning av ungdomsofficerare och ungdomsarbetare och dialog mellan organisationer genom konferenser. -Komponent 3 -Advocacy och lobbying Programmet kommer att stödja och bevilja bidrag till YCSO -initiativ som förespråkar genomförande av en ungdoms rättslig ram i Bosnien och Hercegovina och stödja utvecklingen av ungdomssektorn. Samtidigt kommer KULT att genomföra långsiktiga påverkansinitiativ för och med alla nivåer av styrning i Bosnien och Hercegovina.

The CHANGE goal is to empower youth, youth civil society organizations and institutions for sustainable development of a youth framework in BiH and recognition of youth as the driving force behind positive change in BiH on its EU path. If youth civil society organizations (YCSOs) get support and build their capacities to establish sufficient linkages among each other; get support in diversifying funding sources; and improve their cooperation with authorities; if authorities in BiH build their capacities for taking a comprehensive approach to youth issues and if youth gain skills, attitude and knowledge on youth policy framework, then YCSOs will become more sustainable, effective, integrated, responsive, and accountable entities within their respective communities and BiH society; youth participation will increase and young people will be seen as a resource on Bosnia and Herzegovina’s EU path. The programme has three main components: -Component 1 – Empowerment of youth leadership through capacity building Within this component, KULT and strategic partners will empower youth (both women and men and especially marginalized youth) to take a leadership role, coordinate, lead and cooperate with YCSOs and authorities in their communities. This will be done through educational training programmes, sub-grants to YCSOs and grants for local civic initiatives across BiH. -Component 2 – Empowering youth development through granting The programme will award and manage grants to local partners to develop advocacy initiatives for the development of youth framework in BiH. The programme support will include grants and capacity building for YCSOs included in the programme. KULT will endeavour to establish connections and collaboration of YCSOs with relevant decision makers and other youth civil society stakeholders. KULT will introduce a platform for sharing experiences and developing the youth work community of practice in BiH through training of youth officers and youth workers, and dialogue among organizations through conferences. -Component 3 – Advocacy and lobbying The programme will support and award grants to YCSO initiatives advocating for the implementation of a youth legal framework in BiH and supporting the development of the youth sector. At the same time, KULT will implement long-term advocacy initiatives for and with all levels of governance in BiH.

tag.narrative: 10.2 - By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status.

10.2 - Till 2030 möjliggöra och verka för att alla människors, oavsett ålder, kön, funktionsnedsättning, ras, etnicitet, ursprung, religion eller ekonomisk eller annan ställning, blir inkluderade i det sociala, ekonomiska och politiska livet.
16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.

title.narrative: Agreement w KULT institute regarding CHANGE programme 15101

description.narrative: According to the Completion memo for contribution 11328 (August 2021) which was approved for the predecessor youth development project (2017-2021) KULT's main objectives were the following: 1. Improved conditions for democratic accountability to young people and their participation in civic and political processes, including the promotion of free elections. 2. Young women and young men have, to a greater extent, the same power to shape society and their own lives. 3. Increased trust and reconciliation among young people in all parts of BiH. The KULT project has achieved all technical goals of the cooperation. This has also been verified independently by an evaluation. In summary these were the main achievements: -Several local strategies for youth have been adopted or are in the process of development and 7 local youth councils formed during the life of the project and through its support. -Young people participating in KULT's training programs have been elected in municipal councils, and cantonal assemblies; -At least 40% women participated in all of KULT's activities (trainings and LCIs) has been achieved -Over 50 initiatives implemented in more than 30 local communities over the past three years (5 out of 6 leaders of initiatives are female) 5 activities developed to promote fight against GBV -More than 100 youth leaders and young politicians trained over the past 3 years -More than 100 youth officers completed trainings over the past three years -Approx. 10 advocacy campaigns completed successfully -Broad outreach achieved (approx. 1500 young people directly participated in initiatives implemented by youth leaders over the past three years) Over 1000 media reports were published on KULT's activities -Updated statistical research on youth issues was made in cooperation with Ministry of Civil Affairs
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
